title: Crashing In-Game

replies.body:
Checked our records and our servers are just fine! Bear in mind that servers for each site or service you visit are in different geolocations, therefore routing issues to one server may not show up to another. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings on your network are good before we check your route.

Let me know if those steps helped.
